description: Detects cases in which a file gets renamed to .dll, which often happens to bypass perimeter protection Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Rename Common File to DLL File
query: ((file.path:*.dll AND (NOT (OriginalFilename:(*.dll OR *.tmp) OR OriginalFilename:*.dll.*))) AND (NOT (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe)))
